LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Bandana.label: bandana
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Bandana.description: A warm and long piece of fabric protecting the jaw from exposure to wind. Makes one hard to remember.
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Sombrero.label: sombrero
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Sombrero.description: Used to shield the wearer from the sun. Required for any kind of stand-off.
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_FlatCap.label: flat cap
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_FlatCap.description: A flat and handy cap. Somewhat protecting from the sun. Worn by settlers and colonists during their daily occupations.
